org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

クラス Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.Figure
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    ContainerFigure, EllipseFigure, LineFigure, PointFigure, RectangleFigure, RoundedRectangleFigure, SolidEllipseFigure, SolidPolygonFigure, SolidRectangleFigure, SolidRoundedRectangleFigure, TextFigure

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    Superinterface for all drawing objects. All drawing objects know how to render themselved to the screen and can draw a temporary version of themselves for previewing the general appearance of the object onscreen before it gets committed.

      Computes the damaged screen region caused by drawing this object (imprecise), then appends it to the supplied region.

      Draws this object.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(FigureDrawContext fdc)
        Draws this object.
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information

      • addDamagedRegion

        public abstract void addDamagedRegion(FigureDrawContext fdc,
                    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Region region)
        Computes the damaged screen region caused by drawing this object (imprecise), then appends it to the supplied region.
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information
        region - a region to which additional damage areas will be added
